text: Nīṅkaḷ kaṭaliliruntu naya(mum, cuvaiyu)muḷḷa mīṉ pōṉṟa māmicattai pucippataṟkākavum, nīṅkaḷ aṇintu koḷḷakkūṭiya āparaṇattai atiliruntu nīṅkaḷ veḷippaṭuttavum avaṉ tāṉ ataṉaiyum (kaṭalaiyum) vacappaṭuttit tantāṉ; iṉṉum atil taṇṇīraip piḷantu koṇṭu cellum kappalai nīṅkaḷ kāṇukiṟīrkaḷ; (palvēṟu iṭaṅkaḷukkuc ceṉṟu) avaṉ aruṭkoṭaiyai nīṅkaḷ tēṭavum, nīṅkaḷ naṉṟi celuttum poruṭṭum (atai) ivvāṟu vacappaṭuttik koṭuttāṉ
